data.title: CANDY release second offering, "Love Like Snow", from upcoming full-length 'It's Inside You' | Comments
data.meta_description: Richmond, VA-based hardcore unit Candy has released their new single "Love Like Snow," showcasing a shift towards melody and softness with prominent electronic and trance-like production. This track features vocals ...
data.text:
Jason Nocito

Richmond, VA-based hardcore unit Candy has released their new single "Love Like Snow," showcasing a shift towards melody and softness with prominent electronic and trance-like production. This track features vocals from MIRSY, the side project of Marisa Shriar from Fleshwater, and mmph, the alias of Los Angeles producer Sae Heum Han who mixed and co-produced the song.

Accompanying the single is a cinematic music video directed by Candy's Michael Quick. "Love Like Snow" offers another glimpse into Candy's forthcoming album titled It's Inside You, set for release on June 7th via Relapse Records.

Pre-order It's Inside You here.

Additionally, Candy will be performing two nights with The Dillinger Escape Plan at New York City's Brooklyn Paramount on June 21st and June 23rd. Both shows are now sold out.

06/21 Brooklyn, NY @ Brooklyn Paramount w/ Car Bomb & Candy

06/23 Brooklyn, NY @ Brooklyn Paramount w/ Deadguy, Candy, Car Bomb & The Callous Daoboys
